body: Fucking white knights down below lmao this manhwa was hot tho and had a good story

Viper is 100% on point. Stupid teenager or not though, that's probably the only reason I'd want to see her suffer. It all ended with her being taken to the motel too; nothing that happened in there really mattered.

Well, as the last few chapters show, she's clearly a complete monster and the guys are heroes.... not.
How's it feel to be so wrong you vengeful, dickless nerds?

Sghost: Man, you are a pathetic dick. You write all this shit in response to my comment without even haven't read the story.
Sit down, you get a 6d for effort and fail this whole semester.

Ghost you can't be more right, and I am up to date. The chick is a asshole, but she didn't deserve all of this form the guys. Like botc said the only one with real merit here is the teacher because she directly fucked his life. I don't care that she was a hurt teen, that is no excuse for ruining his career and love life. I still can't rap my head round why the rest of the guys are there though.
Though I'm not fond of dark emotional stories...

botc76, you're talking out of your ass. I haven't read this yet but from what I make of it, the gender reverse of this scenario has even been seen in Hollywood fucking movies. The "victims" are the good guy and their target for revenge is the bad guy. I'm sure you can think of a few examples. Who the fuck thinks those guys are cool studs? I'm not defending anyone in this story 'cause I don't know the story, but lets not get delusional here. You're calling out guys you don't know for imaginary hypocrisy. As if there's no precedent for this kind of "revenge getting" being lauded. Especially with the genders reversed. "But how could anyone be on their side?!?!?!" lol You've got to be kidding me. 

That said, I'll see for myself who's side I'm on after reading it.

The Chinese are winning the translation race

smh

It's simple, the guys need to know about the step father and kill him. Yes I know the girl is a whore but she became like that because of her mothers bullshxt philosophy and father's sick fantasies of her. 

The mother and father need to die.
And hopefully in the end everyone gets along.

Lol. As a guy I think most of those guys are pathetic assholes, with the priests son being the worst.
She didn't even do the thing he is after her for.
He comes to her with a  raging boner telling HER she should repent, just like his dick of a father.

The same with her ex-boyfriend, all the lousy decisions he made, she didn't string him along or anything, he just went for that on his own.
The only one with  a real reason to hate her is the teacher, but she was a hurt teenager when she did it.
She was in love with him, thought he could save her from her stepdad's abuse and when he rejected her she wanted vengeance.
But again, she was just a stupid teenager, they are all grown men who kidnapped a woman to rape and torture her.
Anybody who is on their side is a sick psycho, a pity so many men seem to think this way.
She's no saint, she's led men along, used them to gain wealth, but if she was a guy doing this with stupid women, most of you hypocrites would think he was a cool stud.
sweet jesus chapters 42 is on sadpanda
This is still on-going, but because the site (yomanga), which uploaded the raws, shut down, they had to find another source.
so is this dead? no updates in a month fam

I love how much men get butthurt about stories like this. Most of the men got it coming, only the teacher was truly screwed over. It's y'all's fault for trying to project yourself into the role of the men, thinking they'll get the fucc and that's all there is to it.

I agree with Syabul. If you can't just interfere her being abused, I'm so sorry, but it's like the first thing you get at the very beginning of the teacher chapter. But her fooling around with feelings to get money is something I can't stand...
ay relax man, we just expressing our opinion here

No, fuck that plotline, we don't even know if she was abused or not, all that guy did was call her a bitch. *looks around* "I said biiiiiiitch"
This bitch really is a BITCH, go step-dad!

But really tho, that rape accusation part was the most sophesticated twist, if he could keep that flow constantly across the whole story totally worthy to read even if this 1000+ page long. This kind of creativity could easily beat the shit out of twilight + harry potter combined

GADDAMN MAN TIS MASTERPIECE WAS INTENSE
Wait so was she abused when she was a kid or something...?
for now the only bad thing she did was the false accusation of rape, we don't know the oldman story

I’m up for redeeming or making a character more sympathetic but 500 + total pages... counting the beginning of the story is a little late IMO to try and run things back for her character, but let’s see how it goes.
